title: Oil Falls as Trump Says Venezuela to Give Up Some Crude to US
description: Oil extended losses after President Donald Trump said Venezuela would turn over as many as 50 million barrels of crude to the US, which would be sold at market prices to benefit both countries.
content: Oil extended losses after President Donald Trump said Venezuela would turn over as many as 50 million barrels of crude to the US, which would be sold at market prices to benefit both countries.
